content.title: Interactive CV Web Application
content.description: Developed an innovative, web-based interactive CV/portfolio that visually represents my diverse skill set through orbiting bubbles. Each bubble symbolizes a key area of expertise: Entrepreneur, Educator, Writer, Game Designer, and Programmer. The application offers an engaging user experience with animated interactions, allowing visitors to explore my professional journey and accomplishments in a unique, memorable way.

infoBoxes.title: Key Features
infoBoxes.content: Interactive bubbles, Dynamic content loading, Responsive design

infoBoxes.title: Showcase
infoBoxes.content: Creative design skills, Technical proficiency, Multidisciplinary expertise
